thread.title: Big 60 College Exposure Basketball Showcase live on GameTimePA.com on Oct. 11
thread.title_full: Big 60 College Exposure Basketball Showcase live on GameTimePA.com on Oct. 11

author: GameTimePA.com
title: Big 60 College Exposure Basketball Showcase live on GameTimePA.com on Oct. 11
text:
Big 60 College Exposure Basketball Showcase live on GameTimePA.com on Oct. 11 Tournaments, sponsored by PAHoops.org, draw attention of college coaches Posted: 08/24/2015 08:10:56 PM EDT 
Two upcoming Big 60 College Exposure Basketball Showcases will be shown live in their entirety on GameTimePA.com . 
The October events, sponsored by PAHoops.org , will draw high school basketball players from across the state and the country. Players will participate in three games during the showcase, each shown live on GameTimePA.com . 
Sunday's event at Lancaster Bible College will start at 8:45 a.m., and games will run until 3 p.m. Sunday's girls' games will feature top players from the L-L League, including Pequea Valley's Alyssa Hershey and Warwick's Rylee Derr, Class AAAA Parkland in the Lehigh Valley, and girls from New Jersey, Maryland, and Delaware.
